title: T206 Cree for sale Piedmont 350 SOLD
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: T206 Cree for sale Piedmont 350 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello, I am selling a T206 Birdie Cree card.  Piedmont 350 Factory 25.  If you look closely, you will see a small light crease in the top center, going down into his hat, plus some light creasing in bottom center and a tiny crease on the left on his belt.  

Any type of payment is fine.  If you are interested, please contact me through my email.  

SOLD

Thank you.  Rick
if I can't find an already graded version of this soon, ill probably pick this up from you. need it for my team set. just trying to avoid having to send it to PSA and wait.
